titleStmt.title: A new catechisme, commanded to be set forth in this time of reformation, being the principall grounds of Christian religion, with directions for the examining of all persons, before they come to receive the holy Communion, or Lords Supper. Also, with a breefe direction, how to read the Holy Scriptures with profit. / Written by William Good, minister of Gods word, at Denton in Norfolke. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Goode, William, b. 1599 or 1600.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
